title: Take a look at our rules

sections.title: Toxic behavior
items: Any form of insult or vulgar language is prohibited.
Insults towards students or staff are not tolerated.
Social discrimination is not allowed in our groups.

sections.title: Chat interactions
items: Sending messages with the sole purpose of disturbing (flooding) is forbidden.
Defamation against students or staff is not allowed.
Abuse of commands and functions provided by the bot is not allowed.

sections.title: Spam
items: Unauthorized advertising or promotion is forbidden.
Political self-promotion or promotion of associations without approval is forbidden.
Polls and surveys are allowed only if approved or in the dedicated group.

sections.title: Shared content
items: NSFW or illegal material is forbidden.
Sharing offensive or discriminatory content is forbidden.

sections.title: Netiquette and tips
items: Write in the correct group before asking questions.
Check if the answer has already been given before asking.
Maintain clear and respectful language.
Do not tag administrators or other students unnecessarily.
Share useful information when asking for help.
